eventDetails: Learn professional techniques for creating realistic armor pieces using EVA foam, thermoplastics, and weathering. Bring your own basic tools - advanced materials provided. Limited to 15 participants.
Epic level 15 adventure through the Shadowfell! Pre-generated characters provided or bring your own. Snacks and energy drinks included. Must be 18+ due to mature themes and late hours.
Full day screening of Spirited Away, Princess Mononoke, and Howl's Moving Castle with intermissions. Japanese with subtitles. Bring pillows and blankets for comfort. Light refreshments available.
